item.description: • Changed the colour space of colours used in the app

• Added a scale effect when dragging cards • Cards can now be automatically moved to (other) tableau stacks, preferring the largest stack • The whole tableau stacks are now used as drop zones for cards and card fans • Secondary clicks (right mouse button clicks) can now be used to automatically move cards
• Cards that are not the top-most card in the waste pile or in foundation stacks can not be dragged anymore • Improved animations when undoing and redoing moves

• Added visual effects to the cards • Added a pile effect to the stock and waste stacks • Cards now drop onto their designated ace cell automatically • Added card back settings to the Deck & Game Settings context menu • The window now has a preferred size and a minimum size
• Improved the sizing of the play area • Improved dropping card fans
